properties.sfomuseum:description: Brochure issued by British Commonwealth Pacific Airlines (BCPA), promoting Douglas DC-6 fleet; blue, red, and white cover with color photographic image of woman in swimsuit and text “Fly BCPA across the Pacific in the 300-m.p.h. Douglas DC-6 via colourful Fiji and Hawaii”; contains illustrated guide to featured destinations.
